rooms.text: You have reached the Exit - Congratulations
You are in a dungeon. A goblin stares at you menacingly
rooms.question: The Goblin charges toward you, blade drawn. Do you:

answers.outcome: You parry the goblin's strike, and cleave it in two, but not before it nicks you with a hidden blade.
You sprint towards the nearest exit, outpacing the goblin easily

rooms.text: You pass through the door and run down a corridorâ€¦
rooms.question: At the end of the corridor, you find two doors and must pass through one of them. Do you

answers.text: Go through the right hand door
answers.outcome: You fall down a 3 meter drop on the other side, slightly injuring your ankle. You climb out of the hole and into an open courtyard.

answers.text: Go through the left hand door
answers.outcome: The door locks behind you and you are in an open courtyard.

rooms.text: You see a table with food and drink
rooms.question: You are tired, hungry and thirsty. Do you:

answers.outcome: You recover from your injuries and you are ready to move to the next room

answers.text: Ignore the table of refreshments, fearing poison and move on to the next room
answers.outcome: Your injuries and fatigue cause you to fall into a bed of hemlock. You die. Horribly. Ouch!

rooms.text: You are now in a beer cellar. You are tempted to try the merchandise
rooms.question: The barkeep offers you a beer. Do you:

answers.outcome: One beer is never enough and you get horribly drunk, in your haze, you stagger off.

answers.text: Decline and ask for directions to the W.C.
answers.outcome: You reach the W.C. and have a wash.

rooms.text: You reach a library. You see the librarian, who is an orangutan, hanging around the desk.
rooms.question: The librarian says 'OOOK?' Do you:

answers.text: Return the book you borrowed last time you were here and apologise for being late.
answers.outcome: Return the book you borrowed last time you were here and apologise for being late.

answers.text: Borrow the book eagerly recommended by the librarian, as this is your first visit and you wish to impress
answers.outcome: You open the book and find a map to the exit

rooms.question: You hear a menacing screech from overhead and look up to see a huge bird of prey, Do you:

answers.text: Run to the first door you can see behind you
answers.outcome: Find yourself back in the first room

answers.text: Run to the door at the other end of the courtyard
answers.outcome: Take too long and you are attacked by the bird and die
